mapper.select: SELECT P.PNO, P.PFILENAME, P.PNAME, P.PPRICE, PDISRATE, ( SELECT AVG( RRATING ) FROM REVIEWS R WHERE P.PNO = R.PNO ) AS PRATING FROM PRODUCTS P , (SELECT * FROM (SELECT O.PNO, SUM(O.OAMOUNT) FROM ORDERS O, PRODUCTS P WHERE O.PNO = P.PNO GROUP BY O.PNO ORDER BY SUM(O.OAMOUNT) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10) A WHERE P.PNO = A.PNO
